gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl

Class ReferentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl.ReferentManager

  • public class ReferentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows access to the single ReferentResolver instance across multiple service implementations.
    Author:
    Ryan Chute

        public static boolean isInit()

      • getImageRecord

        public static ImageRecord getImageRecord(info.openurl.oom.entities.Referent rft)
                                  throws ResolverException
        Gets ImageRecord for the initialized IReferentResolver impl.. This method may be used when metadata is provided about the resource and the underlying resource resolver needs to resolve the metadata to an identifier and resource location.
        Parameters:
        rft - OpenURL OOM Referent object for the requested ImageRecord
        Returns:
        an ImageRecord containing a file path to resource or resource defined in object, typically byte[] or InputStream
        Throws:
        ResolverException

      • getImageRecord

        public static ImageRecord getImageRecord(java.lang.String rft)
                                  throws ResolverException
        Gets ImageRecord for the initialized IReferentResolver impl.
        Parameters:
        rft - identifier/url for the requested ImageRecord
        Returns:
        an ImageRecord containing a file path to resource or resource defined in object, typically byte[] or InputStream
        Throws:
        ResolverException

      • init

        public static void init(IReferentResolver referentResolver,
        java.util.Properties props)
                 throws ResolverException
        Initialize referent manager w/ resource resolver instance and properties. Example: ReferentManager.init((IReferentResolver) Class.forName(implClass).newInstance(), props);
        Parameters:
        referentResolver -
        props -
        Throws:
        ResolverException
